description: Cheesy cauliflower mash makes this a shepherd's pie with a difference.
name: Cauliflower Mash Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.8 cup beef stock, made with one stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan on a medium high heat, drizzle the oil and cook the onion, carrot and celery for 8 minutes until softened. Add the garlic and cook for a minute. Increase the heat to high, add the mince, break up with a spoon and cook for 5-7 minutes until nicely browned.
Stir in the tomato puree and rosemary, mix well to coat and pour over the beef stock. Bring to the boil and simmer for 15 minutes until the sauce has reduced and thickened.
Place the cauliflower in a large saucepan, cover with water and boil for 10-12 minutes until soft. Drain and add the parmesan, then blend with a handheld blender to a coarse mash.
Pour the mince into a casserole dish, smooth the mash on top and bake for 20 minutes until golden and bubbling.
